| HistoryText             = The Vega-men are copies of the X-men who defeated Krakoa, but made out of natural materials by one of his spores, Vega-superior. They include:

A Colossus made of Stone

A Wolverine made of Ice

A Cyclops that shoots Lava

An Angel made of leaves and vines

A Nightcrawler made of mud

However, they are much weaker than the original X-men, and Nightcrawler easily defeats them all, before defeating Vega-superior himself.{{r|Excalibur Vol 1 #31}}
